result.reason: Valid UX enhancement: dynamic 'Connected' and 'Recent' virtual groups would surface active/recent connections without manual organization, a commonly requested workflow improvement.
result.approach: Introduce a SmartContainerInfo subclass with a FilterCriteria enum (Connected, Recent), populate dynamically in ConnectionTreeModel by hooking into connection open/close events and a recently-used MRU list (e.g. last 10 entries persisted in app settings); render as read-only virtual nodes in the tree view.
